name: Pixel Space Shooter (Tarcísio Costa)
description:
Pixel Space Shooter is a simple shoot-em-up game made for the #pixelsandspace game jam.

To play:
Arrow keys / WASD to move.
Space bar to shoot.

Credits: 

BGM:

By Abstraction: http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/ http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Font:

https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante
